name: Shoot 'M Off
description:
Your goal is to defeat the other player by shooting him off the map!

Controls:

  •  Player 1:
    • WASD =  Movement
    • Space = Shooting
    • Wall Jump = pressing jump key again when hitting a wall
  • Player 2:
    • Arrow Keys = Movement
    • Right CTRL = Shooting
    • Wall Jump = pressing jump key again when hitting a wall

You can't go to the other side of the player, so you better aim right. When close to the middel of the platform you shoot slower but your movement is less restricted and your cooldown is less.

When you move to the edge of your platform your bullet will become faster thus more powerfull, but your movement will become more restricted and the cooldown will be higher.

Enjoy :D
